title: Client wont open after champ select
body: So I started a ranked match today and the client opened fine. But when I was doing my second match, the game won't open after the champion select. And  I cant reconnect the game. The game ended up with a remake showing in my history.  I was wondering how this could be fixed.

replies.body:
Hmmmmm it sounds like either the client was being blocked from making any connection to the game servers. 

Do me a quick favor and try running through the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover the basics first, but *also* make sure you disable any firewalls/antivirus when playing (or at the very least add specific exceptions for League to those two).
